mapper.select:
SELECT RN,NUM,TITLE,CONTENT,TERRAIN,POINT,APPROVAL,REGIST_DATE,QR,UPDATE_DATE,START_ADDRESS,END_ADDRESS,NICKNAME,STARTTIME,ENDTIME,COURSE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, P.NUM AS NUM,P.TITLE AS TITLE,P.CONTENT AS CONTENT,P.TERRAIN TERRAIN ,P.POINT AS POINT,P.APPROVAL AS APPROVAL ,P.REGIST_DATE AS REGIST_DATE ,P.QR AS QR,P.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE ,P.COMPANY_NUM AS C ,P.START_ADDRESS AS START_ADDRESS, P.END_ADDRESS AS END_ADDRESS, C.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME,P.STARTTIME AS STARTTIME ,P.ENDTIME AS ENDTIME,P.COURSE AS COURSE FROM TBL_PROJECT P ,TBL_COMPANY C WHERE P.COMPANY_NUM = C.NUM
AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND NUM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND START_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND TERRAIN = '1'
AND TERRAIN = '2'
AND TERRAIN = '3'
AND TERRAIN = '4'
AND (REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (STARTTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (ENDTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (UPDATE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})

SELECT COUNT(NUM) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, P.NUM AS NUM,P.TITLE AS TITLE,P.CONTENT AS CONTENT,P.TERRAIN TERRAIN ,P.POINT AS POINT,P.APPROVAL AS APPROVAL ,P.REGIST_DATE AS REGIST_DATE ,P.QR AS QR,P.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE ,P.COMPANY_NUM AS C ,P.START_ADDRESS AS START_ADDRESS, P.END_ADDRESS AS END_ADDRESS, C.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME,P.STARTTIME AS STARTTIME ,P.ENDTIME AS ENDTIME FROM TBL_PROJECT P ,TBL_COMPANY C WHERE P.COMPANY_NUM = C.NUM )
WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE NUM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE START_ADDRESS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND TERRAIN = '1'
AND TERRAIN = '2'
AND TERRAIN = '3'
AND TERRAIN = '4'
AND (REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (STARTTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (ENDTIME BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND (UPDATE_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})

SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, COURSE, TERRAIN, POINT, APPROVAL, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, START_ADDRESS, END_ADDRESS, DISTANCE, QR, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, COMPANY_NUM, USER_NUM FROM TBL_PROJECT WHERE COMPANY_NUM = #{companyNum}

SELECT NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, COURSE, TERRAIN, POINT, APPROVAL, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, START_ADDRESS, END_ADDRESS, DISTANCE, QR, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, COMPANY_NUM, USER_NUM FROM TBL_PROJECT WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PROJECT (NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, COURSE, TERRAIN, POINT, APPROVAL, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, START_ADDRESS, END_ADDRESS, DISTANCE, QR, REGIST_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, STATUS, COMPANY_NUM, USER_NUM) VALUES (SEQ_PROJECT.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{course}, #{terrain}, #{point}, #{approval}, #{startTime} , #{endTime}, #{startAddress}, #{endAddress}, #{distance}, #{qr}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '1' , #{companyNum}, #{userNum})
mapper.select: SELECT NUM, TITLE, project_Date, JJIM_COUNT FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_PROJECT ORDER BY JJIM_COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10
SELECT NUM, TITLE, project_Date, POINT FROM ( SELECT * FROM TBL_PROJECT ORDER BY POINT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <=10

select * from( SELECT * FROM (SELECT PROJECT_NUM, COUNT(PROJECT_NUM) APPLYCOUNT FROM TBL_APPLY a GROUP BY a.PROJECT_NUM) a JOIN TBL_PROJECT p ON a.PROJECT_NUM = p.NUM ORDER BY APPLYCOUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=10
